laboratory_examinations.findings: Neutropenia with compensatory monocytosis, anemia (lowest RBC: 3.16 T/L, lowest Hgb: 9.4 g/dL) with normal serum iron concentration and normal platelet count.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Serial blood counts showed a cyclical pattern of neutropenia occurring in a 20-day period.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normocellularity with polymorphic composition and no blast infiltration. Signs of slight dysgranulopoiesis with eosinophilia (11.6%) and myeloid maturation arrest at the promyelocyte stage.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Performed in the nadir phase (370 neutrophils/ÂµL).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Direct sequencing did not reveal pathogenic variants in ELANE.
Revealed a heterozygous p.T117del (c.349_351del) in-frame deletion mutation in the SRP54 gene.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The same sequence variant was found in a different sample.
